page.title: 06The school
page.content: Most of the pupils attending East Winch Voluntary Aided Primary School live in the village of East Winch and the village of West Bilney. There are forty nine children in the school and their ages range from almost five to eleven. At the age of eleven the children transfer to a High school in King's Lynn, Gaywood Park High School.There are three teachers and three classes inthe school, a part time secretary/welfare assistant, a caretaker, a kitchen assistant and a lunchtime supervisor for the children who stay at school for lunch.The children are taught in their three classes with the five to six year olds in class one, the seven to nines in class two and the nine to elevens in class three.
